chunk:
Happy Skin Care Sunrise Over C Mattifying Facial Oil (2020 formulation)

Brand: Happy Me Skincare

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment
book: 1439-Happy Skin Care Sunrise Over C Mattifying Facial Oil (2020 formulation)

chunk: Ingredients: Jojoba Esters, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Vaccinia Vitas-idaea (Lingonberry) Seed oil, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Oil, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil, Ascorbyl Tetraisopalmitate (Vitamin C), Serenoa Serrulata (Saw Palmetto) Fruit Extract, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil -
book: 1439-Happy Skin Care Sunrise Over C Mattifying Facial Oil (2020 formulation)

chunk: Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil, Ascorbyl Tetraisopalmitate (Vitamin C), Serenoa Serrulata (Saw Palmetto) Fruit Extract, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil - Bergaptene free, Agonis Fragrans Branch/Leaf (Fragonia) Oil, Cedrus Atlantica Wood (Cedarwood) Oil, Beta-Sitosterol, Tocopherol (Vitamin E).
book: 1439-Happy Skin Care Sunrise Over C Mattifying Facial Oil (2020 formulation)

chunk: Directions: Apply 1 to 2 drops after cleansing & tonic/serum to damp face & neck. Friendly to sensitive & oily skin. Store below 30oC away from direct sunlight. Don t use if allergic to nuts. Patch test before use. Discontinue if irritation occurs.
book: 1439-Happy Skin Care Sunrise Over C Mattifying Facial Oil (2020 formulation)

chunk: Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
book: 1439-Happy Skin Care Sunrise Over C Mattifying Facial Oil (2020 formulation)
